verses.text_plain: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
verses.verse_html: 1But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:

verses.text_plain: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
verses.verse_html: 2That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.

verses.text_plain: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
verses.verse_html: 3The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

verses.text_plain: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
verses.verse_html: 4That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,

verses.text_plain: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
verses.verse_html: 5 To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.

verses.text_plain: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
verses.verse_html: 6Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.

verses.text_plain: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
verses.verse_html: 7In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,

verses.text_plain: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
verses.verse_html: 8Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.

verses.text_plain: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
verses.verse_html: 9Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;

verses.text_plain: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
verses.verse_html: 10Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

verses.text_plain: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
verses.verse_html: 11For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

verses.text_plain: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
verses.verse_html: 12Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;

verses.text_plain: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
verses.verse_html: 13Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

verses.text_plain: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
verses.verse_html: 14Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

verses.text_plain: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
verses.verse_html: 15These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
